amendment.description: To authorize the use of proceeds from land sales in the State of Nevada for Lake Tahoe restoration projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1737 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1737 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S11816-11819; text: CR S11818) To authorize the use of proceeds from land sales in the State of Nevada for Lake Tahoe restoration projects.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1737 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1737 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Ensign.
